title: Kingdom The Far Reaches (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
- Run "setup_kingdom_2.0.0.12.exe"
- Play
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS! :)
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!

Title: KINGDOM: THE FAR REACHES
Genre: Adventure - Action - Fantasy
Works on: Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10) and Mac OS X (10.6.8)
Languages: Audio and text: English
Modes: Single-player
Released: December 30, 1995
Size: 242 MB
Company: Interplay / Interplay
Rating:	ESRB Rating: Teen (with Mild Cartoon Violence)
Store page: http://www.gog.com/game/kingdom_the_far_reaches

About:
Long ago in a land of five Kingdoms an amulet, known as the Hand of Mobus, was shattered into five pieces and hidden throughout the Far Reaches. Dark Magic spread throughout the land and the evil wizard Torlok began his reign of terror.
Now the fate of the Five Kingdoms rests upon Lathan, the last of the Argent Kings. To restore freedom he must first recover the broken pieces of the amulet, but his journey is filled with many challenges. Danger and evil forces await as you guide Lathan on his quest of power and magic.
A unique gameplay style based on using the right items in the right situations, or else...
Lots of classic cartoon video footage
Youâ€™ll be surprised how easy it is to die in a fantasy world!

Minimum system requirements - Windows: Windows XP or Windows Vista, 1 GHz Processor (1.4 GHz recommended), 512MB RAM (1 GB recommended), 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7 (compatible with DirectX 9 recommended), Mouse, Keyboard
